content.prompt: Which of the following best characterizes the author’s treatment of the Mendicant friars in the third paragraph?

choices.label: He denounces the imperialistic nature of the friars’ mission.
He is skeptical of the friars’ commitment to transforming Indian consciousness.
He appreciates the wealth of cultural knowledge amassed by the friars.
He is moved by the religious fervor of the friars.

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Explain how word choice, comparisons, and syntax contribute to the specific tone or style of a text.
